action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image appears to be a pixelated representation of four Tetris blocks in different orientations and colors. There is a purple "T" shaped block on the top left, a green "L" shaped block on the top right, an orange "L" shaped block (mirrored compared to the green one) on the bottom left, and a pink "T" shaped block (mirrored compared to the purple one) on the bottom right.
continue

Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image appears to be a pixelated or abstract representation with various shapes and colors. There are five distinct shapes, each with a different color: purple, dark green, light green, orange, and pink. The shapes resemble Tetris blocks, with the purple and dark green shapes connected, forming a sort of "L" shape on the left side. The light green shape is a square pixel, separated from the others on the top right. Below it, there's a pink "T" shaped block. Lastly, there's an orange "L" shaped block in the bottom left corner, disconnected from the rest. The background is white.
